targets.rawSql:
SELECT
             MAX(name1) AS name1,
             MAX(name2) AS name2,
             serial1,
             serial2,
             CONCAT(serial1, '|', serial2) AS link_key
           FROM spans
           GROUP BY serial1, serial2
           ORDER BY MAX(fecha_lote) DESC
